item.title: Deep learning materials
item.description: Bellow there are some materials that can help you to understand deep learning. Courses Machine learning by Stanford University (link) Books Deep Learning with Python by Francois Chollet (link) Deep Learning by Ian Goodfellow, Yoshua Bengio, and Aaron Courville (link) Neural Networks and Deep Learning by Michael Nielsen (link) Videos Neural Networks Demystified by stephencwelch(link) Others Awesome IA (link)
